testimony.name: Indiana Porta
key_points: Requests for public availability of written and oral testimony
Clarification on the universal affordability preference proposal, specifically the fixed percentage of affordable housing
Suggestion to set a base minimum of affordable units (20%)
Question about recently rezoned areas and how the new initiative would affect them
Support for accessibility features as a wheelchair user

quotes_indicating_discussion.text: Specifically for the universal affordability preference proposal, I am hearing different things. Right? It sounds like in the materials that were provided by DCP that the 20% additional housing that would be required to be affordable.
quotes_indicating_discussion.reasoning: The speaker directly mentions the Universal Affordability Preference proposal and discusses the 20% additional affordable housing requirement, which is a key feature of this element.

quotes_indicating_discussion.text: So just clarity on that, is it a fixed percentage of the affordable housing? And I would encourage the commission and if not, the council members when they vote on this to set a base minimum of deformable units. Right? I think 20% seems fair.
quotes_indicating_discussion.reasoning: The speaker is asking for clarification on the fixed percentage of affordable housing and suggesting a minimum requirement, which directly relates to the UAP element of the proposal.
